text: Manchester Oxford is a major Rail station it is Managed by Northern Trains & Transpennine Express Located in Oxford Road of Manchester Holds between Manchester Airport, Windermere, Newton-le-willows, Barrow-in-Furness, Carlisle, Newcastle, Edinburgh, Glasgow Central Liverpool, Blackpool, Leeds, York, Middlesborough, Redcar Central, Chester, Sheffield and holyhead Category:Railway stations in Manchester
title: Manchester Oxford Road railway station
